events.content:
Your Cloudflare invoice is available

Hi Tyler,

Your invoice for January 2026 is now available.

Account: Intent Systems
Invoice #: INV-2026-01-CF-7842
Amount: $127.50
Due Date: January 25, 2026

View your invoice at: https://dash.cloudflare.com/billing

Thank you for using Cloudflare.

--
Cloudflare, Inc.
101 Townsend St
San Francisco, CA 94107
events.subject: Your Cloudflare invoice is available

metadata.description: Automated invoice email from Cloudflare showing company entity and billing relationship
metadata.notes: Tests: Company entity extraction (Cloudflare, Intent Systems), CUSTOMER_OF relationship, no person entity for automated sender
